title: Гостья из будущего
overview:
6-grader Kolya Gerasimov discovers a time machine in a basement of
 an old house in Moscow and gets transferred into the 21st century. 
There he is allowed to look around. Accidentally, Kolya witnesses two 
space pirates who arrive from Saturn and later try to steal a device 
called a "Mielophone" (which can read thoughts) from Alisa Seleznyova - a
 girl that performs experiments with this device and animals. Kolya 
manages to save the device from the pirates and brings it back to the 
20th century. But both pirates and Alisa get there too. Alisa knows 
where Kolya studies but doesn't know what he looks like. Pirates saw 
Kolya, but don't know anything about him.  © by Boris Shafir
